programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep13
programme.desc: Night - The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Pretty In Pinkeye / The Monsters Are Due On Harvey Street - Pinkeye gets a makeover and takes his new persona a little bit too far. The kids rally when Harvey E. Harveson statue’s hand is replaced with a mysterious note.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep13
programme.desc: The Primrose Classic / The Blimpateers - A professional paper airplane thrower hires Archibald to be his caddie. While floating through the sky, Archibald bumps into birds who live in a blimp.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep39
programme.desc: A Thuper Hero Thtory - Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End Of The Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep19
programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavian’s Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over who’s in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep39
programme.desc: Run For The Border - When King Julien hosts the ultimate party, his Boom Box breaks, the kingdom becomes too crowded and he builds a giant wall to surround the kingdom.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep13
programme.desc: Star - Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep15
programme.desc: Scrambled Eggs/George Stephenson - Sherman accidentally swaps a class project with a dinosaur egg that hatches on stage, so Peabody must help to send it back before it ruins the show

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.desc: Total Nightmare - When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.desc: The Battle Of Two Bridges - Jim must surrender to Bular and unlock the Killahead Bridge to save kidnapped Blinky and promises Claire that he will get her brother back.

programme.desc: Total Nightmare - When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep39
programme.desc: Run For The Border - When King Julien hosts the ultimate party, his Boom Box breaks, the kingdom becomes too crowded and he builds a giant wall to surround the kingdom.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert & The Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert & The Octopus’S Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet'S Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep26
programme.desc: Casper The Match Maker / Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher - Casper, the Match Maker When Frankengymteacher gets extra crabby, the kids realize he's secretly in love with their history teacher, Hedy. Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher On “take your kid to work day,” Jimmy's dad invites him to tag along as a junior ghost catcher.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep11
programme.desc: Crystal Venom - The Castle of Lions mysteriously turns against the Paladins, forcing Princess Allura to make a difficult sacrifice to save Team Voltron.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep11
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Two - After Bullwinkle drinks a monster serum, he can’t control when he turns into a big hairy monster, so he and Rocky go on the run from angry mobs and internet celebrities

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep1
programme.desc: King Me - Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep2
programme.desc: Poll Position - King Julien learns that 99% of the lemurs love him, so he makes it his mission to find and convert his one "hater."

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Uncle King - Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep11
programme.desc: My Fair Foosa - To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien “civilizes” a Foosa.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep13
programme.desc: Crimson And Clover - Clover's wild, party-girl twin sister Crimson visits and King Julien is instantly smitten.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep14
programme.desc: Pineapple Of My Eye - Masikura tricks King Julien into believing that a pineapple contains all the souls and wisdom of the previous Julien Kings.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep15
programme.desc: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game - King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17
programme.desc: Election - After he’s rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had – despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep19

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75

programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Hum-Dino - Mayor Humdinger takes his Kitties to the Dino Wilds for some dino acting lessons, but instead finds himself on top of a runaway Brachiosaurus bound for Adventure Bay! Now it's up to the pups to save the town before the dino stomps all over it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep709
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Sore Dino / Dino Rescue: Pups Save the Triceratops Tag-Alongs - In the Dino Wilds, Marshall performs some dino dentistry with the help of an ancient geyser and his fellow Dino Pup pals. // Francois and Cap'n Turbot are in Dino wilds for an adventure but a sightseeing expedition quickly turns into a dino ride!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Pups Bark with Dinosaurs - The Paw Patrol is on an excavation dig when they unearth three fossilized eggs. Suddenly the eggs start to hatch, and there are three baby pterodactyls running around Adventure Bay! It's up to the PAW Patrol to catch the dinos!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: We promise, Papa - When he sees the barbababies wasting water, Barbapapa takes them aside to tell them a funny story.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Story Time with Blue - We are almost ready to read but first we need to play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite story! While looking for clues, we help Shovel & Pail act out "Jack & Jill" and match the three bears with their belongings.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Darington to the Moon! - Today Darington will attempt his biggest stunt yet: rocketing to the moon! But his battery-powered rocket is out of energy. To get to the moon, Blaze must help Darington recharge his battery with all the energy they can find.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone / Pups Save the Deer - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs! // Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a family of deer stuck on slippery ice!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus/A Hole Lot of Trouble - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Captain Steel - Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mountain Ninja Rescue - Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure Hunt - Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Dinosaur Parade - Blaze, AJ, and lots of spectators have gathered to watch herds of dinosaurs march through Axle City! But Crusher pushes his way into the parade, scattering dinos everywhere. It's up to Blaze, AJ, and Zeg to find and rescue them!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Santiago's Greatest Treasure / The Golden Banana Treasure - When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Coral Dilemma - When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Socks - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc - Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The PAW Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch! // When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster/Winter Lights - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep65
programme.desc: Honk Honk - The Teletubbies hear a 'honk honk' in the distance and the Tubby Car approaches. The Tubby Car drives the Teletubbies across Teletubbyland as they sing the Tubby Car song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep10
programme.desc: Star - Dee encourages a friend to say 'star', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of stars - a yellow star, a bright one, a pointy star and a jingle star.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Puzzlin' Tool Wall - Logi-Po's tools fit neatly on the wall - so, when Doug-Po knocks them down, can the rest of the team put everything back together?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: It's time to paint - JoJo and Gran Gran head to the library in search of the new Captain Chloe book, but the children's section is closed for redecoration.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Silence for Stan - When Stan is sick and resting in bed, Monty tries to find a quiet game to play but wonders if all the best games are noisy.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Crowded House - The Kazoops house is feeling a bit crowded, so Monty imagines what it would be like if he and Jimmy Jones lived by themselves.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Bike - Bluey is struggling to learn how to ride her bike. But as she and Dad watch her friends determination with their own tasks, Bluey is inspired to give it another try.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: The Get Well Soon Badge - Oh dear, poor Norrie is sick. Can the squirrels think of something to cheer her up?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: The Rocking Horse Badge - Duggee introduces the squirrels to Bucky his old rocking horse. Saddle up, squirrels!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: The Show And Tell Badge - Duggee has something really interesting to show at the clubhouse. Can the Squirrels find some other interesting things to share?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Sea Arch Escape - Xuli's flying race around the Academy inspires cadet Tala to fly the Grimbler. But she crashes into a fragile sea arch that could collapse right on top of her!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: Shopping Shenanigans, Istanbul, Turkey - Glitch's wishes cause underground trouble in Istanbul - an ancient ceiling may collapse!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Hotel - Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them how to compromise.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Galapagos Sea Lions - Andy blasts off in his safari sub to the Galapagos to see how sea lions deal with flies.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: Grace's Favourite Machines - Grace looks back at her favourite land, water and air machines, but which will they be?

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: Maps the Way To Do It - Captain Sinker tries to teach Cook and Line how to map read by setting them a course to navigate in the cabin. Meanwhile, the Swashbucklers aim to win back all Gem's jewels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: The Castle Badge - The squirrels hear an echo-ey voice coming from the top of a castle's spooky tower. Who is making all that noise?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: The Paper Boat Badge - When Duggee's newspaper gets blown away, the squirrels race to rescue it - and help some stranded ants along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: The Paddling Pool Badge - It is a scorcher of a day, and luckily Duggee has a big paddling pool -yippee! Time for the squirrels to have lots of fun.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: Svalbard Global Seed Vault, Norway - Ubercorn and Glitch head to the Svalbard Global Seed Vault. But, just like when they were cadets together, the two of them get into trouble.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: Mariana Trench: The Pacific Ocean - With the help of his hero Ron Allum, Lars plans to dive to the bottom of the Mariana Trench in a submersible called the Deep Sea Challenger.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep3
programme.desc: James In The Dark - James refuses to be fitted with a lamp to help him see in the dark; he regrets his decision when he picks up the wrong person.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep40
programme.desc: Duck Flies - Duck sees some flying, migrating ducks in the sky and decides he would like to try it too.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep39
programme.desc: Bug Bop - Bug and his friends lead Sarah & Duck to their outdoor music concert.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Nora's Plant - Nora wants to find the perfect place to grow her little plant.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep17
programme.desc: What If I Get Lost in the Middle of Nowhere? - A surprise school trip is planned, and Lola starts to worry that she might get lost, so she prepares with bright clothes, whistles, and pebbles.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: The Thing That Was A Surprise - Bob is convinced that things are more exciting when you don't know they're going to happen.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: The Thing That Rescued Us - Gwen, Bob and Tony bounce very high from some mushrooms and get stuck in a tree.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.title: Global Watch

programme.title: Biz Talk

programme.title: Back To Nature Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Aaron and Holly yarn on Wurundjeri country near Melbourne, take in the mysteries of Hanging Rock-Ngannelong, and connect with deep time at an ancient quarry.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep19
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep5
programme.desc: In this Summer Special of The Business, the team brings you some of the biggest headline stories of 2022 including the crypto crisis and the collapse of construction companies. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep255
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep255
programme.desc: Dan Conifer presents a complete round-up of the day's top stories, the latest news and the issues that matter. ABC Evening News brings together the best reporting from across the nation and speaks with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep255
programme.desc: Australians turn to ABC News when news breaks at home or abroad. Dan Conifer presents the day's top stories, latest news and information, exclusive investigations and reports from respected journalists across the nation.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - In South Australia, guest presenter Paul West goes on a wild ride along the Eyre Peninsula's rugged west coast, finding a place with an untamed spirit and a fierce self-reliance.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep260
programme.desc: Manny Tsigas brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Enjoying the bounty of Autumn, Analiese harvests her first honey, goes on her first hunt for venison, and takes her former boss and mentor, Peter Gilmore, foraging for wild mushrooms.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep260
programme.desc: Australia's most trusted source of independent news, ABC News connects Australians with the latest news, original reporting, reliable information and analysis to keep you informed and up-to-date. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep3
programme.desc: In this Summer Special of The Business, the team delves into the energy crisis that developed in 2022, including the reasons behind it. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: The World Ep260
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep11
programme.desc: Since Russian President Vladimir Putin invaded Ukraine in February, about 30,000 Russians have fled to Georgia. Reporter Eric Campbell travels to the former Soviet republic to meet the brave people opposing Putin and his war.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep28
programme.desc: Turn to Australia's most trusted source of news to bring you a complete wrap of the day's events. Manny Tsigas presents the day's top stories, latest news and updated information plus context, analysis and original reporting.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep20
programme.desc: Vaping was hailed as the new way to quit smoking but there are concerns it is now causing nicotine addiction in teens. Grace Tobin investigates the booming black market which is thriving due to a failure to police the rules.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Pete and Mick Cooke's mining operation grinds to a halt, while Col's crew head underground and the Rookies are in despair until mentor, John Dunstan, steps in with a last-minute lifeline.

programme.title: Y2K: The Bug That Didn't Bite
programme.desc: 23 years ago the world overcame the Y2K crisis. John Barron looks at how Australia beat the millennium bug, a global panic over fears our computer systems would meltdown when the date hit 1/1/2000.

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2022 Heywire project. Presented by Karla Ranby.

programme.title: The World In 2022
programme.desc: From Port Moresby's beauty queens to Russian prisoners of war, The World host Beverley O'Connor presents some of the most memorable reports from the ABC's team of international correspondents in 2022.

programme.title: Farewell to Leigh Sales - A 7.30 Special
programme.desc: We look back over Leigh Sales' 12 years as host of 7.30 including her most memorable interviews with some of the world's most powerful and famous figures, plus never-before-seen footage from behind the scenes.

programme.title: 8 Billion People And Counting
programme.desc: The global population has now exceeded 8 billion people. In an ABC News Special Casey Briggs breaks down the facts and figures, looking at how we got here and the issues and opportunities of population growth ahead.

programme.title: Gardening Australia: New Year's Family Special 2017
programme.desc: The Gardening Australia team prepare for summer in the garden. Costa visits a miniature garden; herbs to take on holiday; what to plant in January; we revisit the Karen refugee vegetable garden.

programme.title: Australia Calling: 80 Years of International Broadcasting
programme.desc: In 1939 PM Menzies launched Australia's first international broadcast service Australia Calling. For more than 80 Years ABC has delivered an Australian perspective on the culture and events of the Asia Pacific.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep1
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Cabinet Papers 2002
programme.desc: On January 1, the National Archives unlock a trove of confidential Cabinet documents after 20 years have passed. Minister for Family and Community Services Amanda Vanstone speaks about the release of Cabinet Papers from 2002.

programme.title: ABC News Ep1
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep17
programme.desc: The ABC News Video Lab explains the events and issues making news in Australia and around the world. In this episode the Earth's population passes 8 billion people, plus the ACT decriminalises hard drugs.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep1
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Spy Game
programme.desc: Australia's top foreign spy chief, Paul Symon, the outgoing head of the Australian Secret Intelligence Service, talks about the threat of Russia, China and what he looks for in a secret agent.

programme.title: ABC News Ep1
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep1
programme.desc: How deep will the housing downturn go? We speak to property analysts, economists and real estate agents about whether prices will rebound in 2023 plus top tips on buying or selling in this market. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Ep1
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: In Conversation with Pat Cummins
programme.desc: Pat Cummins, the first fast bowler to Captain the Australian mens test cricket team sits down with Tracey Holmes to discuss his dramatic rise to the top job and the future of Aussie cricket.

programme.title: ABC News Ep1
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: My Story

programme.title: Japan Sportscope "Caving"
programme.desc: Caving is an outdoor activity that anyone can enjoy. MC Harry Sugiyama visits the Fuji Fugaku caves, and traverses tricky trails to discover fantastic walls of ice that soothe the spirit.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Professor Ryad Alsous fled Syria in 2013 in the civil war as his life was in danger. He has set up a beekeeping project in the North of England, to help other refugees.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Takinogawa River
programme.desc: We travel to a well-known tourist resort just outside of Edo, where day-trippers are enjoying river recreation and forest walks, praying at local shrines, and sitting down for riverside picnics.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Kampo is a traditional medicine that developed in Japan. Critics say there is a lack of scientific evidence regarding its use. But recent studies have proven its effects against COVID-19.

programme.title: Exploring The Lands Of The Ainu
programme.desc: Episode 2: Biratori Features the Ainu peoples' traditional "Cipsanke" ritual, a ceremony to launch new canoes held in Biratori, in Sarugun, Hokkaido.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ceramic Treasures
programme.desc: Today: Karatsu-yaki, Saga Prefecture. We will visit the potters from all over Japan and discover their ceramics heritage by introducing the culture and historical background.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: Samurai Wheels 2022 Special
programme.desc: Will Japan, the world leader in hybrids, be able to catch up to their global competitors in the race for EV market share? This episode will feature the latest models from Japan's top auto makers.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: The world comes alive in a different way after sunset, with bright city lights or the glow of a 24-hour industrial complex. See how the scenery changes through the night with time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Schools in the Philippines were closed for the duration of the pandemic, and educators are worried that some students have fallen behind. Meet the two teachers working to regain what was lost.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition #5
programme.desc: This episode features Japanese aquaculture companies that are using technology and innovative ideas to ensure their businesses remain afloat.

programme.title: Pandemic History, Info & Tips
programme.desc: How can we associate better with COVID-19? Let's find the key by learning about the history of the infectious diseases Japan has experienced. This time: Benefits in the Edo Period.

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: Maki layers cheese and basil between slices of pork to make deep-fried cutlets. Marc tosses crispy chicken in tangy scallion sauce. And from Taiwan, a bento featuring a local favorite: lu rou fan.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Buddhist altars are found in many Japanese homes. Making them involves traditional crafts. But as they become less common, one artisan is now using his skills to turn disused ones into accessories.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Takinogawa River
programme.desc: We travel to a well-known tourist resort just outside of Edo, where day-trippers are enjoying river recreation and forest walks, praying at local shrines, and sitting down for riverside picnics.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at kotatsu: traditional heated tables.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: J-Arena
programme.desc: BMX flatland. Bicycle riders perform difficult tricks, like spinning on the wheels or riding on the handlebars in a flat arena. We meet Japan's leading riders to learn about this fascinating sport.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Danjuro: A Kabuki Star
programme.desc: In November of 2022, Kabuki actor Ichikawa Ebizo assumed the name Ichikawa Danjuro XIII. Let's Look at a special performance to mark the name change and the highlights of his repertoire.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Stopping The Next Pandemic Part2
programme.desc: Coverage in Japan and we learn the importance of protecting biodiversity. This connects to a "One Health" concept which involves treating human, animal and environmental health as a unified whole.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Anime Supernova
programme.desc: Based in Osaka, Sukikara Makiko creates humanistic stories with animals as the main characters. Join us and find out the secret behind the critically acclaimed creator's creativity.

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Lion school? The Darwin team found just that in the African savanna. Juveniles learn hunting, parenting and dealing with rivals. Be warned: lion around can get you schooled in the mane subject.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: KONNYAKU, an essential part of Japanese cuisine, is high in fiber and low in calories. This time, we learn all about KONNYAKU, which is gaining attention around the world as a superfood.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Samurai Wheels 2022 Special
programme.desc: Will Japan, the world leader in hybrids, be able to catch up to their global competitors in the race for EV market share? This episode will feature the latest models from Japan's top auto makers.

programme.title: Five Frames For Love #28
programme.desc: Photo-Artist Arisak Creates Her Own Universe as Cool as Ice -Fellows, Freedom, Future- This artist overcomes a childhood trauma to forge a new style of photography + art, taking us to another world.

programme.title: Danko & Danta: Marching Drum
programme.desc: Cardboard girl Danko, her friend Danta, and craft master Mr. Snips team up to make toys out of cardboard. In this episode, learn to make a fun and sturdy marching drum.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time Scoop Hunter
programme.desc: In the Edo period, yureki-sanka traveled Japan teaching math to the common people. Two such teachers find themselves in a battle of wits, with the leadership of a village math school at stake.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Hanami, Kyoto's cherry viewing festivities in the spring. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions (28 Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: landmine clearance machines & linear guides.

programme.title: 100 Ideas To Save The World
programme.desc: About 30% of Japan's population is over 65. Against the backdrop of an increasingly aging society, this episode introduces the stories about supporting and staying present in the lives of the elderly.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking that we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "Algorithm March"...

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.
